Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: handheld
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this product, it's a discontinued item, you can get the homesight starter kit. Can't us camera with out it.

Reviews.Title: don't buy unless you have the homesight wireless easy start kit
Reviews.Author: Penzoom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera, however if you don't have the homesight wireless easy start kit, which motorola discontinued and sold to Xanboo, then I would pass on this camera, because you won't be able to use it without the software.

Reviews.Title: good picture
Reviews.Author: Sittingduck
Reviews.Content: Good picture for an inexpensive system. I would recommend this as an add-on. It can be found extremely cheap. Highly recommended for those with tight budgets looking to expand their home sight system.

Reviews.Title: Cost too much...
Reviews.Author: Deepak Vij
Reviews.Content: I didn't do my research you need to use a base unit for this and it costs like a $100 you can get a similar system for $49 at ecost. Sorry Motorola you make great stuff but you failed to become the Sony here of electronics. $189 for a non weather proof system is too expensive.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture, motion sensor screwy, range not that great gets fuzzy
Reviews.Author: Robin "Robin"
Reviews.Content: The motion sensor is screwy and captures "events" every 5 minutes when there is clearly nothing around to stimulate it.  Product line is being D/Ced, HOWEVER overall it works well.  Cust. Support was great even thought they couldn't solve my problems.
